bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions developing at the fingertips, with the finger tips burning and turning red and swollen and painful as the major characteristic. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu song 蜈蚣 quotes Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 : 天蛇頭瘡：生手指頭上。用蜈 蚣一條，燒烟熏一二次即愈 , “ Celestial snake head sores: They develop at the fingertip. Use 1 centipede, roast and fumigate [the sores] with its smoke once or twice and it will be healed”.
